resources.string:
WARNING!!!
 Cadpage notifications are **NOT** working under Android 10, which is currently being distributed to Pixel devices. If you are running on a Pixel, try to avoid upgrading to Android 10 until we can get this fixed. If you have already upgraded to Android 10, please switch to the Cadpage beta test track. We will probably release the Android 10 fix as beta release in the next couple days.
 
 v2.1.5-01
 Location Fixes:
 Escambia County, FL
 
 General Fixes:
 Problem registering with and reporting status to CodeMessage and Cadpage Paging.
 Problem reporting Android 9 notification permission problem to users.
 
 v2.1.4-05

 v2.1.4-04

 Lyon County, MN
 Craven County, NC
 Macon County, NC
 Pickens County, SC
 
 v2.1.4-03
 Modified to target Android 9. For most users, upgrading to this release will be uneventful. For reasons that remain mysterious, a handful of users will discover that regular Cadpage notifications now require permission to access user data. Cadpage will attempt to identify these users and request user data permission when this update is installed in hopes of preventing it from failing when a real alarm is processed.
 
 Location Fixes:
 Deschutes County, OR
 
 v2.1.4-02
